name: Dale Bell
tagline: Writer, Editor in Chief, Benevolent Tyrant, and Ultimate IB Learner
description: Dale Bell is a determined journalist with only one goal, which he pursues tirelessly: getting the website trending. And also the truth or whatever.

name: Auguste Rame
description:
I put the grammer in programmer and the spell-ing in open-sourcerer. Cyberpunk Technocrat according to Dale.

Psst! All our code and articles are open-source on GitHub!

name: Caleb Levy
description: When he’s not tearing up improving articles for The Snitch, he’s putting off improving articles for The Snitch.

name: Bill Angell
description: Was once told that “Theatre isn’t all there is to life.” In a dejected trance he found himself waking up in The Snitch’s office, and decided to stay out of gratitude for the staff not eating him.

name: Iva Vujacic
description: Human creature from planet earth. Not sure what is happening but is here for the chaos.

name: Erica Molot
description: My three favorite things are dogs and leaving lists unfinished.

name: Bruno Chong
description: This bio has been redacted by The Administration for clarity.

name: Nathan Lopilato
description: Side effects may include: Severe rash, extreme nausea, total organ failure, and painful death.

name: Liv Dentoni
description: Wow, nice nausea Nathan! Fine, I’ll do my job. Follow @thesnitchbcc on Instagram and @snitchbcc on Twitter.

name: Liana Hwang
description:
irony. noun:
when a writer can’t write anything interesting for their own bio.

name: Dr. Verman Politiczuck
description: I have a PhD in Political-Historical Studies from DMOU (Diploma-Mills Online University). I taught US History in Virginia for 25 years. I’m currently exiled in Russia as I have arrest warrants in the US for 5 counts of fraud and 2 counts of making false statements.
